descriptionHtml:
These are hands down the best circlets and headbands I\'ve seen since Skyrim was launched.
There are 35 new meshes/textures in all.

I have changed them to be -
Ready for enchanting - added a new picture showing one enchanted. (hey my enchanting is low atm).
Mage Friendly.
Repriced.
[u][b]Craftable.[/b][/u]

Armored Version in file section as well.
You MAY download both versions at once, I\'m very aware of how NMM works and have made the appropriate modifications.
[u]Just don\'t INSTALL them both at the same time ;)[/u]

You now need to go download zzJay\'s mod first!

Needs some testing/feedback please.

[u]Installation with NMM:[/u]
Go install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27064]KDCirclets full by zzJay[/url]

Install this mod by clicking on \"Download with Manager\".
When asked if you want to overwrite LadyKDCirclets.esp you say \'yes\'.

Changelog 0.95:
There should now be a book on the armoury table in Whiterun outside Warmaidens.
This book must be in your inventory to get the recipes in your crafting table. 
Hope this helps everyone\'s overloaded crafting lists!
As usual tell me if you run into any issues.
P.S. Don\'t lose the book, they are really hard to write.

ToDo:
Leveled lists - don\'t panic it will be an optional file.

After I finish the pics for the book, I\'d like to just make 3 books, A clothing, light and heavy armor version and put it all in the one mod, so you can pick and choose the level of armor rather than having optional downloads.
author: thefinn

files.name: KDCirclets Craftable and Mage Friendly
files.changelogHtml: All recipes now require the Master Jewelry Crafting book to be in the players inventory. This should help with overloaded crafting lists.

files.name: KDCirclets Armored Alternative
files.changelogHtml: All recipes now require the Master Jewelry Crafting book to be in the players inventory. This should help with overloaded crafting lists.
